db:abstract.db:para: Provides classes that enable sending messages via the MQTT protocol.

db:article.db:para: Provides classes that enable sending messages via the MQTT protocol.

db:listitem.db:para: Contains miscellaneous identifiers used throughout the Qt MQTT module.
The QMqttClient class represents the central access communicating with an MQTT broker.
The QMqttConnectionProperties class represents configuration options a QMqttClient can pass to the server when invoking QMqttClient::connectToHost().
The QMqttLastWillProperties class represents configuration options a QMqttClient can pass to the server when specifying the last will during connecting to a server.
The QMqttMessage class provides information about a message received from a message broker based on a subscription.
The QMqttMessageStatusProperties class represents additional information provided by the server during message delivery.
The QMqttPublishProperties class represents configuration options for sending or receiving a message.
The QMqttServerConnectionProperties class represents configuration options of a server a QMqttClient is connected to.
The QMqttStringPair class represents the string pair data type of the MQTT 5.0 standard.
The QMqttTopicFilter class represents a MQTT topic filter.
The QMqttUserProperties class represents a list of QMqttStringPair values which can be passed to the server.
